Serpentor:


Serpentor left his quarters, transforming to beast mode and slithering away.
He started thinking about pop tarts.  He'd never seen one, and he'd never 
tasted one.  His mind then went to Vulois, and how the Matrix told him that 
he, Shockwave, and that Nemesis Enforcer freak would kill him.  He liked the 
idea!

"Maximal energy signature," he said to himself, picking up Striker's 
signature.  "I have to investigate!"
